amendment.description: Amendment to prevent funds from being used to carry out any rule-making on the status of the Lesser Prairie Chicken.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 62 printed in House Report 115-830 to prevent funds from being used to carry out any rule-making on the status of the Lesser Prairie Chicken.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A056) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 199 (Roll no. 354).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A056) offered by Mr. Pearce.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
